CHAT.comment: Time is 14:18. Videotape does not start until later; transcription until then is solely from audiotape

The interaction between Mot and Chi was good in this activity. They both cooperated in working with the magnets , usually piling up the magnets into towers together. Chi usually directed the activities , at one point explaining a game which they played called <stack (th)em>. In this game , they built up a tower of magnets and then the player used the yellow wand to remove the magnets from the tower one by one. There was not much science talk at all. Several times they discussed a little if a particular magnet attracted or repelled other magnets. EXP took a semi-active role in this activity , frequently commenting on the play and encouraging Chi.

u.a: EXP and Chi briefly discuss books that Chi still has from previous home visits , and books and the blue backpack he wasn't allowed to keep
